concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @jakarta.ejb.Stateless with "EJB" and "Stateless".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="jakarta.ejb.Stateless" SET t:JEE:EJB:Stateless RETURN t AS EJB
